Subbu,

On Jan 13, 2010, at 7:29 PM, Subbu Allamaraju wrote:

> However, once the application requires any other party (proxies,  
> CDNs, monitoring tools, log file analyzers etc.) understand such  
> media types, this model starts to fall apart. All such tools will be  
> more than happy to oblige URI patterns and not media types. This is  
> not a media type problem, but a potential reality that Restbucks  
> Inc. may need to account for.


Can you provide an example of the situation that made you change your  
mind?


jan
